title: Can't Launch LoL
body:
Hello!
I can't get LoL to work. I have removed and reinstalled LoL and it still gives me this message,
"PvP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working
A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available."
Can anyone help me? What does this message mean? Help me, please!
Thanks,
speedmccool25

replies.body: This error is usually caused by a security setting, either with your OS or something else, that's blocking the patch from launching.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
